--- title: Post With Code author: Harlow Malloc date: '2023-08-18' categories: - news - code - analysis image: image.jpg format: html: code-fold: false --- This is a post with executable code. {{< video https://vimeo.com/548291297 >}} ```{mermaid} sequenceDiagram participant Alice participant Bob Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you? loop Healthcheck John->>John: Fight against hypochondria end Note right of John: Rational thoughts
prevail! John-->>Alice: Great! John->>Bob: How about you? Bob-->>John: Jolly good! ``` ::: {.cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01) theta = 2 * np.pi * r fig, ax = plt.subplots( subplot_kw={'projection': 'polar'} ) ax.plot(theta, r) ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2]) ax.grid(True) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![A line plot on a polar axis](index_files/figure-html/fig-polar-output-1.png){#fig-polar width=450 height=439} ::: ::: This is a post with executable code. {{< video https://vimeo.com/548291297 >}} ```{mermaid} sequenceDiagram participant Alice participant Bob Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you? loop Healthcheck John->>John: Fight against hypochondria end Note right of John: Rational thoughts
